If you continue we’ll assume you’re OK to receive cookies. More about cookie settings is contained within the Privacy Page. Privacy Policy OK On Monday, April 10, 2023, a report that was commissioned by the Maricopa County Attorney’s Office to investigate printer issues related to the November 2022 general election was released publicly. OKI was not contacted by Maricopa County officials, investigation teams working on their behalf, election services providers, or any other parties associated with the investigation at any time during the investigation. Our correspondence with Maricopa County can be found here: https://www.oki.com/us/printing/support/election-services/index.html OKI Data Americas has discontinued the sales of all OKI-branded printer hardware in the United States, Canada, and Latin America. To find a consumables reseller near you > To purchase spare parts Consumables More Support Download A Driver Platinum Partner Login Purchase Consumables LATEST NEWS 04/04/2023 OKI DATA AMERICAS ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF ITEM, INC AS MASTER CONSUMABLES AND SPARE PARTS DISTRIBUTOR FOR THE AMERICAS 03/28/2022 ABOUT THE USE OF COOKIES IN PRODUCT SERVICES Terms of use | Cookie Settings Copyright ©1995-2024 Oki Data Americas, Inc. By clicking "Cookie Settings", you can customize your cookie settings. In this website, we use cookies to personalise content and ads,to provide social media features and to analyse our traffic. Cookie Notice When you visit any website, it may store or retrieve information on your browser. This information might be about you, your preferences or your device and is mostly used to make the site work as you expect it to. The information does not usually directly identify you, but it can give you a more personalized web experience. Accept All Cookies Manage Consent Preferences ▼ Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Active These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in or filling in forms. You can set your browser to block or alert you about these cookies, but some parts of the site will not then work. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable information. Cookies Details‎ Performance Cookies These cookies allow us to count visits and traffic sources so we can measure and improve the performance of our site. They help us to know which pages are the most and least popular and see how visitors move around the site. All information these cookies collect is aggregated and therefore anonymous. If you do not allow these cookies we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance. Functional Cookies These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalisation. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies then some or all of these services may not function properly. Targeting Cookies These cookies may be set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites. They do not store directly personal information, but are based on uniquely identifying your browser and internet device. If you do not allow these cookies, you will experience less targeted advertising. The domain was created in 1993 and is not due to expire until 2025, which suggests that it is an established domain. The listed contact information appears to be appropriate for a business of this nature. There are no indications from the WHOIS data that this website is a scam.
